Dabei werden wir die Entwicklung, Design und Implementierung von digitalen Lernumgebungen analysieren, um Strategien zur effektiven Nutzung digitaler Medien im Bildungsprozess zu entwickeln. Durch die Auseinandersetzung mit aktuellen Trends und Technologien werden Studierende in der Lage sein, innovative Lernkonzepte zu entwickeln und umzusetzen.

name: Embedded Real-Time Operating Systems
description: "Embedded Real-Time Operating Systems" (CS512): En esta asignatura, los estudiantes adquirirán conocimientos teóricos y prácticos en la implementación y configuración de sistemas operativos en tiempo real para aplicaciones embebidas. Se analizarán los principios y técnicas para garantizar la respuesta y rendimiento en tiempo real de sistemas con restricciones de recursos.

name: Human-Computer Interaction Design 互動多媒體微學程 互動多媒體學程
description: This course, "Human-Computer Interaction Design", covers the fundamental principles and design processes of interactive multimedia systems, enabling students to create user-centered and effective digital products. Students will learn to analyze user needs, design intuitive interfaces, and evaluate the usability of digital systems. Through hands-on projects and case studies, students will develop skills in human-computer interaction, user experience, and multimedia design.

name: Wireless Networking
description: In this course, CS519 Wireless Networking, students will delve into the fundamental concepts and advanced techniques of wireless communication systems, covering topics such as network protocols, security, and device architectures. Through a combination of lectures, lab exercises, and project work, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of wireless networking principles and their practical applications.

name: Interactive Video Game Development Teaching in English 互動多媒體微學程 互動多媒體學程
description: In this course, CS522 Interactive Video Game Development, students will learn to design, develop, and deploy interactive video games using industry-standard software and tools, with a focus on storytelling, user experience, and technical implementation. Through hands-on projects and collaborative learning, students will develop a comprehensive understanding of game development pipelines, game engines (e.g., Unity), and programming languages (e.g., C#). By the end of the course, students will have created their own interactive video game and gained the skills to pursue a career in game development.

name: Big Data Analytics 智慧校園與智慧照護學程
description: 本課程「大數據分析 智慧校園與智慧照護學程」(CS528)主要探討智慧校園與智慧照護的相關技術與應用，包括大數據蒐集、儲存、處理、分析與視覺化等方面。學生將學習如何應用大數據分析於智慧校園與智慧照護的實務應用，並學習使用相關工具與技術來分析與解釋大數據。

name: Internet of Things
description: CS529: Internet of Things. Este curso explora las tecnologías y principios subyacentes que permiten la interconexión de objetos físicos y digitales. Los estudiantes aprenderán a diseñar, implementar y gestionar sistemas de Internet de las Cosas (IoT) para aplicaciones innovadoras en campos como la automatización, la salud, el transporte y la energía.

name: Biostatistics Teaching in English
description: This course introduces biostatistical principles and methods for teaching in an English-speaking academic environment, focusing on data analysis, statistical inference, and research design. Students will learn to communicate complex statistical concepts effectively and apply biostatistical techniques to real-world health research problems. Through lectures, discussions, and assignments, students will develop skills in teaching biostatistics to diverse audiences.

name: Computational Biology
description: "CS535 Computational Biology: This course introduces students to the application of computational methods and tools in the field of biology, focusing on data analysis, modeling, and simulation. Through lectures, discussions, and hands-on projects, students will learn to apply computational techniques to tackle complex biological problems and gain a deeper understanding of biological systems."

name: Medical Informatics and Medical Decision Making
description: This course explores the integration of health information systems and data analytics to support medical decision-making, covering topics such as clinical data management, medical decision-support systems, and healthcare policy. Students will develop skills in data analysis, critical thinking, and problem-solving to address real-world healthcare challenges. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical applications, students will learn to design and evaluate effective medical informatics solutions.

name: Bioinformatics
description: This course (CS537, Bioinformatics) provides a comprehensive introduction to the application of computational tools and methods in the field of biology and life sciences, emphasizing data analysis, genomics, and molecular modeling. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical laboratory experiences, students will learn to apply bioinformatics techniques to understand biological systems and solve real-world problems.

name: Data Mining and Its Applications in Biomedical Domains
description: This course, CS538 Data Mining and Its Applications in Biomedical Domains, introduces students to the principles and techniques of data mining in the context of biomedical research. Through lectures, discussions, and practical exercises, students will learn to apply data mining methods to extract insights from large biomedical datasets, with a focus on predictive modeling, clustering, and knowledge discovery.

name: Clinical Applications of Medical Signal and Image Teaching in English
description: This course explores the theoretical foundations and practical applications of medical signal and image processing in a clinical setting. Students will learn to analyze and interpret various medical imaging modalities, develop algorithms for image enhancement and analysis, and apply signal processing techniques to diagnose and monitor diseases. Through hands-on projects and case studies, students will gain expertise in the clinical applications of medical signal and image processing.

name: Seminar
description: In diesem Seminar werden studentische Forschungsprojekte aus der Informatik vorgestellt und diskutiert, wobei Schwerpunkt auf der Entwicklung von Lösungen für reale Probleme liegt. Durch die Teilnahme an diesem Kurs werden Studierende in die Lage versetzt, komplexe Probleme kritisch zu analysieren, innovative Lösungen zu entwickeln und ihre Ergebnisse zu präsentieren.

name: Operating Systems Teaching in English
description: In this comprehensive course, CS555 Operating Systems Teaching in English, students will delve into the fundamental concepts, design principles, and implementation techniques of modern operating systems. Through lectures, discussions, and hands-on experiments, students will gain a thorough understanding of operating system components, process management, memory management, file systems, and security mechanisms. By the end of the course, students will be able to design, implement, and evaluate the performance of operating systems.

name: Research Project
description: In diesem Kurs (CS556) entwickeln Studenten unter Anleitung eines Betreuers eine eigenständige Forschungsprojekt in einem Bereich der Informatik. Dabei lernen sie die Grundlagen zur Konzeption, Durchführung, Analyse und Dokumentation von Forschungsprojekten. Durch die Arbeit an einem eigenständigen Projekt werden sie befähigt, kritisch zu denken, zu recherchieren und wissenschaftliche Ergebnisse zu präsentieren.

name: Database Systems
description: In this course, CS561: Database Systems, students will delve into the fundamental concepts and design principles of database management systems, including data modeling, database normalization, and querying techniques. Through hands-on experience with industry-standard tools and technologies, students will learn to design, implement, and optimize relational databases, as well as explore advanced topics such as data warehousing and big data analytics.

name: Cybersecurity Teaching in English
description: This course provides educators with the essential knowledge and skills to effectively integrate cybersecurity education into their teaching practices, focusing on curriculum design, pedagogy, and assessment methods in an English-language context. Students will gain expertise in developing engaging cybersecurity lessons, evaluating teaching materials, and fostering a secure digital literacy among students. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical applications, participants will be equipped to enhance cybersecurity education in diverse educational settings.

name: Cryptography Teaching in English
description: In this specialized course, CS565: Cryptography Teaching in English, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of cryptographic techniques and principles, including encryption algorithms, hash functions, digital signatures, and key management. Through lectures, discussions, and hands-on exercises, students will learn to design, analyze, and implement secure cryptographic systems, as well as apply cryptographic concepts to real-world applications in data protection and cybersecurity.

name: Image Processing 人工智慧「智慧視覺分析」微學程 人工智慧「電腦輔助診斷應用」微學程 人工智慧學程 互動多媒體微學程 互動多媒體學程 數位科技應用學程
description: 本課程（CS567）「智慧視覺分析與電腦輔助診斷」微學程，課程內容聚焦於人工智慧在影像處理領域的應用，學生將學習智慧視覺分析、電腦輔助診斷、影像處理技術等相關知識，並深入探討在實際應用中如何結合機器學習和深度學習理論來提升診斷精確度。

name: Computer Graphics Teaching in English 互動多媒體微學程 互動多媒體學程
description: In this interdisciplinary course, CS569: Computer Graphics Teaching in English, students will delve into the fundamentals of interactive multimedia design and production, exploring the theoretical and practical aspects of computer graphics, visual storytelling, and interactive media development. Through hands-on projects and case studies, students will learn to create engaging multimedia content, design interactive experiences, and develop effective teaching methods for computer graphics in an English-language setting.

name: Computer Networking Teaching in English
description: This course provides a comprehensive foundation in computer networking, covering key concepts, protocols, and architectures that enable the transfer and exchange of data across networks. Students will learn to design, implement, and manage network systems, with a focus on network architectures, routing protocols, network security, and quality of service. Through lectures, discussions, and hands-on projects, students will develop a deep understanding of the principles and practices of computer networking.

name: Special Topics on Computer Assisted Instruction
description: In this course, CS606, students will delve into the theoretical foundations and practical applications of Computer Assisted Instruction (CAI), exploring innovative methodologies for enhancing learning outcomes and educational experiences. Through hands-on experimentation and critical analysis, students will develop a deep understanding of CAI's potential to revolutionize teaching and learning.

name: Computation Theory
description: In dieser Einführung in die Berechenbarkeitstheorie werden Studenten an die Grundlagen der theoretischen Informatik herangeführt, einschließlich der Berechenbarkeit von Algorithmen, der Komplexität von Problemlösungen und der Unentscheidbarkeit von Fragen. Durch den Studium der verschiedenen Modellen der Berechenbarkeit, wie Turing-Maschinen und rekursiv aufzählbaren Funktionen, werden die Studenten in die Lage versetzt, fundierte Entscheidungen über die Machbarkeit von Berechnungen und die Komplexität von Algorithmen zu treffen. Dieser Kurs bietet einen umfassenden Einblick in die Konzepte

name: Artificial Intelligence Teaching in English 人工智慧與生物資訊微學程 人工智慧與生物資訊學程
description: This course, CS641: Artificial Intelligence Teaching in English, explores the fundamental principles and applications of artificial intelligence in various domains, with a focus on intelligent systems, machine learning, and natural language processing. Students will gain a comprehensive understanding of AI concepts and techniques, as well as the skills to design and implement AI-based solutions. Through hands-on projects and case studies, students will develop expertise in applying AI to real-world problems in bioinformatics and related fields.

name: Generative AI and Applications Teaching in English
description: This course explores the fundamental concepts, architectures, and applications of Generative Artificial Intelligence, enabling students to design and implement cutting-edge generative models for real-world problems, such as text and image synthesis, and to critically evaluate their limitations and potential impact. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and hands-on experiences, students will master the necessary skills to develop and deploy generative AI solutions in various domains, including natural language processing, computer vision, and multimedia.

name: Electronic Design Automation Teaching in English 計算機軟硬系統設計與整合微學程 計算機軟硬系統設計與整合學程
description: CS650: Electronic Design Automation Teaching in English - This course introduces students to the principles and methodologies of Electronic Design Automation (EDA) tools and techniques for designing and integrating complex electronic systems. Students will learn to apply EDA tools to design, simulate, and verify digital and analog circuits, and to integrate them into system-level designs. By the end of the course, students will be able to design and implement electronic systems using industry-standard EDA tools.

name: Machine Learning 人工智慧與生物資訊微學程 人工智慧與生物資訊學程 人工智慧與金融科技微學程 人工智慧與金融科技學程 智慧校園與智慧照護學程
description: 本課程探討人工智慧在生物資訊、金融科技及智慧照護中的應用。學生將學習機器學習演算法、深度學習、資料預處理及資料分析，了解人工智慧如何被應用於生物資訊的研究、金融科技的分析及智慧照護的系統設計。

name: Deep Learning 人工智慧與金融科技微學程 人工智慧與金融科技學程
description: This course, "Deep Learning 人工智慧與金融科技微學程 人工智慧與金融科技學程" (CS660), is an in-depth exploration of the application of deep learning techniques in finance and technology. Students will learn to harness the power of artificial intelligence to analyze and predict financial trends, develop intelligent financial models, and design innovative solutions for financial applications. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical implementations, students will gain hands-on experience in building and deploying deep learning models for real-world financial problems.

name: VLSI Testing & Design 計算機軟硬系統設計與整合微學程 計算機軟硬系統設計與整合學程
description: This course provides students with a comprehensive understanding of VLSI (Very Large Scale Integration) testing and design principles, emphasizing the integration of software and hardware systems in microelectronic applications. Through lectures and hands-on exercises, students will learn the fundamentals of digital circuit design, testing methodologies, and verification techniques, enabling them to develop efficient and reliable VLSI systems.

name: Special Topics on Software Engineering
description: In this advanced course, students will delve into specialized topics in software engineering, focusing on cutting-edge methodologies, best practices, and innovative techniques for designing, developing, and maintaining large-scale software systems. Through lectures, discussions, and hands-on projects, students will gain in-depth knowledge and practical skills in areas such as software architecture, testing, and quality assurance, as well as emerging trends in software engineering.

name: Special Topics on Intelligent Systems
description:
CS675 - Special Topics on Intelligent Systems: 
Este curso explora las últimas tendencias y aplicaciones de sistemas inteligentes, cubriendo temas como aprendizaje automático, visión artificial, procesamiento del lenguaje natural y sistemas expertos. Los estudiantes aprenderán a diseñar y desarrollar sistemas inteligentes que puedan resolver problemas complejos y tomar decisiones informadas, aplicando técnicas y herramientas de programación avanzadas.

name: Graph Theory Teaching in English
description: This course, CS678: Graph Theory, provides an in-depth exploration of the fundamental principles and applications of graph theory, including graph structures, algorithms, and network analysis. Students will develop a comprehensive understanding of graph theory concepts and learn to apply them to solve complex problems in computer science and related fields. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical exercises, students will gain expertise in graph theory and its teaching methods.

name: Special Topics on Distributed Systems
description: Este curso de Especialidades en Sistemas Distribuidos (CS679) cubre conceptos avanzados en diseño, implementación y gestión de sistemas distribuidos, incluyendo arquitecturas, protocolos y problemas de escalabilidad y confiabilidad. Los estudiantes aprenderán a diseñar y desarrollar sistemas distribuidos robustos y escalables, y a abordar desafíos en la interacción entre procesos y máquinas en entornos distribuidos.

name: Special Topics on Electronic Design Automation
description: This course explores advanced concepts and techniques in Electronic Design Automation (EDA), focusing on the integration of artificial intelligence, machine learning, and cloud computing in electronic design flows. Students will learn how to apply these technologies to improve design productivity, reduce design risk, and accelerate time-to-market. Through hands-on projects, students will gain practical experience in implementing EDA tools and methodologies to tackle complex design challenges.

name: Fundamental Statistical Analysis
description: Este curso de análisis estadístico fundamental, CZ105, proporciona a los estudiantes las herramientas y técnicas necesarias para la comprensión y el análisis de datos cuantitativos. A través de la exploración de conceptos estadísticos básicos, estudiantes aprenderán a recopilar, organizar y analizar datos, así como a interpretar los resultados de manera efectiva. Al final del curso, los estudiantes estarán en condiciones de aplicar habilidades estadísticas en contextos empresariales, sociales y científicos.

name: Energy Technology
description: In diesem Kurs (CZ106) "Energie-Technologie" werden die Grundlagen und Anwendungen verschiedener Energiequellen und -technologien behandelt. Die Studierenden gewinnen ein Verständnis für die Funktionsweise und die Auswirkungen von verschiedenen Energiesystemen sowie für die Möglichkeiten der Energieeffizienz und -einsparung. Durch praktische Übungen und Projekte werden die Kenntnisse in der Anwendung von Energie-Technologien in verschiedenen Sektoren vertieft.

name: Greenhouse Gas Inventory Technology
description: In this specialized course, CZ107 "Greenhouse Gas Inventory Technology," students will acquire a comprehensive understanding of methodologies and tools for calculating and managing greenhouse gas emissions. Through a combination of theoretical foundations, case studies, and hands-on exercises, students will learn to design, implement, and analyze greenhouse gas inventories, enabling them to contribute to climate change mitigation and sustainability initiatives.

name: Net Zero Carbon Strategic Planning
description: Esta coursulma proporcionará conhecimentos e habilidades práticas para a elaboração de planos estratégicos de redução de carbono, focando na implementação de soluções sustentáveis e eficazes para alcançar a neutralidade carbónica. Ao longo do curso, os participantes aprenderão a analisar a complexidade dos sistemas energéticos, desenvolverem soluções inovadoras e implementarem ações concretas para a transição energética.

name: Material & Energy Balance
description: Course CZ112: Material & Energy Balance explores the fundamental principles and applications of mass and energy balance in chemical and process engineering, enabling students to analyze and optimize complex systems. Through theoretical foundations and practical problem-solving, students will learn to design, operate, and control processes, ensuring efficient use of resources and minimizing environmental impact. This course is tailored for students with a strong background in chemical engineering.

name: Climate Change Impact
description: "Climate Change Impact (CZ114) - This course examines the causes, consequences, and potential solutions to climate change, focusing on the impact of global warming on ecosystems, human societies, and the economy. Through a multidisciplinary approach, students will learn about climate change mitigation and adaptation strategies, as well as policy and management frameworks for addressing this global challenge. By the end of the course, students will be able to critically evaluate the impact of climate change and develop effective responses to this pressing issue."

name: Training Course of ISO 14067
description: This course provides in-depth training on the ISO 14067 standard, covering the principles, requirements, and applications of greenhouse gas quantification and reporting, enabling students to develop a comprehensive understanding of environmental accounting and reporting practices. Through lectures, discussions, and case studies, students will learn how to quantify and report greenhouse gas emissions and removals, and apply the standard in real-world scenarios.

name: Course_Course
description: Esteemed students, this course, "Course_Course" (Course Code: Course), is designed to provide an in-depth exploration of fundamental concepts in the field. Through a combination of theoretical frameworks and practical applications, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of key principles and develop essential skills to analyze complex issues. By the end of the course, students will be able to apply their knowledge to real-world scenarios, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of the subject matter.

name: Calculus I Teaching in English
description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamental concepts and techniques of single-variable calculus, including limits, differentiation, and integration, with a focus on theoretical foundations and practical applications. Students will develop problem-solving skills and mathematical reasoning through a combination of lectures, discussions, and assignments. By the end of the course, students will be able to apply calculus to model and analyze real-world phenomena.

name: Calculus II Teaching in English
description: This course, DE102 Calculus II, is an advanced mathematics course that builds upon the foundational concepts of Calculus I, covering topics such as integration techniques, parametric and polar functions, vector calculus, and sequences and series. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical applications, students will develop a deeper understanding of mathematical modeling and analysis, and cultivate problem-solving skills in a variety of mathematical contexts. Upon completion, students will be able to apply calculus principles to solve complex problems and develop analytical thinking.

name: Computer Programming Lab.I Teaching in English 智慧製造學程
description: This course, DE103 Computer Programming Lab.I, is an introductory laboratory course that covers the fundamental concepts and skills of programming in a real-world context. Students will learn to design, develop, and troubleshoot computer programs, focusing on problem-solving and critical thinking skills essential for a career in the rapidly evolving field of intelligent manufacturing.

name: Computer Programming Lab.II Teaching in English 智慧製造學程
description: This course, DE104 Computer Programming Lab. II Teaching in English 智慧製造學程, is an intermediate-level programming lab that focuses on advanced programming concepts, data structures, and software design principles. Students will learn to design, implement, and test complex software systems, as well as develop problem-solving skills and programming best practices. Through hands-on laboratory exercises and projects, students will gain practical experience in programming languages and software development methodologies.

name: Introduction to Chemical Engineering & Materials Science Teaching in English
description: In this introductory course, students will explore the fundamental principles of chemical engineering and materials science, including thermodynamics, kinetics, and transport phenomena, with a focus on the design and development of materials and processes. Through lectures, discussions, and problem-solving activities, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of the key concepts and principles in these fields. By the end of the course, students will be able to apply theoretical knowledge to real-world problems and design solutions in chemical engineering and materials science.

name: Introduction to Industrial Engineering Teaching in English
description: This course introduces students to the fundamental concepts and methodologies of Industrial Engineering, with a focus on the theories and practices of teaching and learning in an industrial engineering context. Students will gain a comprehensive understanding of industrial engineering principles, as well as the skills and strategies necessary to effectively communicate and teach these concepts to diverse learners. Through a combination of lectures, discussions, and hands-on activities, students will develop the knowledge and expertise required to succeed in teaching industrial engineering in a variety of settings.

name: General Chemistry Teaching in English
description: In this course, DE107 General Chemistry Teaching in English, students will develop the skills and knowledge necessary to effectively teach general chemistry principles to students with diverse linguistic and cultural backgrounds. Topics include lesson planning, pedagogical strategies, and assessment methods tailored to English language learners. Through interactive discussions and hands-on activities, students will cultivate expertise in teaching chemistry concepts in an English-speaking classroom.

name: General Physics Teaching in English
description: In this foundational course, students explore the principles and methods of teaching general physics to non-science majors in an English language instructional setting. They will develop a deep understanding of physics concepts, learn effective teaching strategies, and cultivate their English language skills to communicate complex ideas to diverse learners. Through a combination of lectures, discussions, and hands-on activities, students will prepare to design and deliver engaging physics lessons in an English language classroom.

name: Introduction to Mechanical Engineering Teaching in English
description: This course provides an introduction to mechanical engineering principles and practices, delivered in English for international students. Students will gain a comprehensive understanding of the fundamental concepts, theoretical foundations, and practical applications of mechanical engineering, enabling them to design, analyze, and develop innovative solutions in this field.

name: Introduction to Biotechnology and Biomedicine Teaching in English
description: In this foundational course, students will explore the principles and applications of biotechnology and biomedicine, examining the latest advancements and innovations in the field. Through a combination of lectures, discussions, and hands-on activities, students will develop a comprehensive understanding of the subject matter and acquire essential skills for effective teaching in English. By the end of the course, students will be equipped to design and deliver engaging biotechnology and biomedicine lessons to diverse audiences.

name: Materials Science Teaching in English 全校性跨領域--材料科技學程
description: This course, Materials Science Teaching in English, provides an interdisciplinary approach to the fundamental principles and applications of materials science, covering topics from structural properties to innovative materials and technologies. Students will develop a comprehensive understanding of materials science concepts and learn effective teaching methods to convey complex ideas in a clear and engaging manner, with a focus on English language proficiency.

name: Special Topics in Engineering I Teaching in English
description: This course explores advanced engineering concepts and methodologies through lectures, discussions, and assignments taught in English. Students will develop their problem-solving skills, critical thinking, and communication abilities as they delve into specialized topics in engineering. By the end of the course, students will be able to analyze complex engineering problems and propose innovative solutions in a professional and culturally competent manner.

name: Experimental Design Teaching in English
description: In this course, DE204 Experimental Design Teaching in English, students will explore effective strategies and methodologies for designing and implementing English language instruction in experimental teaching settings. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical applications, learners will develop skills to create engaging and meaningful learning experiences for students of varying proficiency levels. By the end of the course, students will be equipped to critically evaluate and design experimental teaching projects that foster language acquisition and cultural competence.

name: Green Ergonomics & Sustainable Manufacturing Teaching in English
description: In this interdisciplinary course, DE207: Green Ergonomics & Sustainable Manufacturing, students will explore the integration of sustainability principles with manufacturing and ergonomics practices to create environmentally conscious and worker-friendly production systems. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and hands-on applications, students will learn to design and implement sustainable manufacturing processes that minimize environmental impact while promoting worker well-being. By the end of the course, students will be equipped with the knowledge and skills necessary to develop and implement green ergonomics and sustainable manufacturing strategies in various industries.

name: Engineering Drawing Teaching in English
description: This course, DE211 Engineering Drawing Teaching in English, introduces students to the principles and techniques of engineering drawing in English, focusing on precision, clarity, and communication. Through lectures, workshops, and projects, students will learn to create detailed technical drawings, understand standard notation systems, and practice effective communication of design concepts. By the end of the course, students will be able to create accurate and informative engineering drawings that meet industry standards.

name: Engineering Mathematics II Teaching in English
description: In this advanced engineering mathematics course, students will develop a deeper understanding of mathematical concepts and techniques essential for solving complex engineering problems, including differential equations, vector calculus, and linear algebra. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical applications, students will learn to analyze and model real-world systems, and effectively communicate their mathematical solutions in a technical context.

name: Mechanics of Materials Teaching in English
description: This course provides an in-depth exploration of the fundamental principles and concepts in mechanics of materials, covering topics such as stress, strain, and failure analysis, as well as the application of theories to real-world engineering problems. Students will develop a strong understanding of material properties and behavior under various loading conditions, and learn to analyze and predict the responses of structural components to different types of loading.

name: Transport Phenomena and Unit Operations I Teaching in English 全校性跨領域--綠色能源學程
description: In this foundational course, DE235 Transport Phenomena and Unit Operations I, students will delve into the fundamental principles and concepts of transport phenomena, including mass, heat, and momentum transport. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and laboratory experiments, students will develop a comprehensive understanding of unit operations, enabling them to design and optimize various chemical and energy processes. This course is an essential introduction to the principles of process engineering and green energy technologies.

name: Physical Chemistry II Teaching in English
description: This course delves into advanced concepts of physical chemistry, building upon fundamental principles learned in introductory courses. Students will explore topics such as thermodynamics, kinetics, and quantum mechanics, and develop a deeper understanding of the underlying theories governing chemical phenomena. Through a combination of lectures and problem-solving exercises, students will cultivate their analytical and critical thinking skills in the application of physical chemistry.

name: Linear Algebra Teaching in English
description: This course, DE253 Linear Algebra Teaching in English, provides pre-service and in-service mathematics teachers with the skills and knowledge to effectively teach linear algebra concepts to students of varying proficiency levels in English. Through a combination of lectures, discussions, and hands-on activities, students will develop a deep understanding of linear algebra theories and methods, as well as pedagogical strategies for communicating these concepts to learners in an English-language classroom.

name: Production Planning and Control II Teaching in English
description: This course, DE354 Production Planning and Control II, builds upon foundational principles to provide advanced knowledge and skills in the design, implementation, and management of production planning systems. Students will learn to analyze complex production environments, optimize processes, and develop strategies for effective control and continuous improvement, enabling them to drive operational excellence in various industries.

name: Researching Project
description: In diesem Kurs (Researching Project, EE800) lernen die Studierenden, die wissenschaftlichen Methoden und Techniken zur Durchführung von Forschungsarbeiten anzuwenden, um fundierte Ergebnisse und Schlussfolgerungen zu erhalten. Schwerpunkte liegen auf der Entwicklung einer Forschungsfrage, der Durchführung von Literaturrecherchen, der Analyse von Daten und der Darstellung der Ergebnisse in einer wissenschaftlichen Arbeit. Durch die Teilnahme an diesem Kurs erhalten die Studierenden die Fähigkeit, eigenständig und qualitativ hochwertige Forschungsprojekte zu konzipieren und durchzuführen.

name: Adaptive Signal Processing
description: Coursus EE801 : Traitements d'Anticipation Signaux : Ce cours présente les concepts fondamentaux de la traîteement d'anticipation de signaux, couvrant la théorie et les algorithmes de traitement adaptatif de signaux, y compris les filtres adaptatifs et les réseaux de neurones. Les étudiants apprendront à concevoir et à analyser des systèmes de traitement adaptatif pour les applications variées, tels que la reconnaissance de modèles, l'estimation de paramètres et la détection de signaux.

name: Signal Detection
description:
Entraînement à la Détected Signal (EE803) : 
Dans ce cours, les étudiants découvriront les méthodes théoriques et pratiques pour détecter et analyser les signaux dans divers domaines, notamment l'électronique, la télécommunication et les systèmes de contrôle. Ils apprendront à identifier les différents types de signaux, à modéliser leur comportement et à mettre en œuvre des algorithmes de détection efficaces.

name: Random Signal Processing
description: "El análisis y procesamiento de señales aleatorias es un campo fundamental en el campo de la ingeniería eléctrica. En este curso, EE804, los estudiantes aprenderán a identificar y analizar características estadísticas y espectrales de señales aleatorias, y a aplicar técnicas de procesamiento de señales para mejorar la calidad y la fiabilidad de sistemas y sistemas. A través de la teoría y la práctica, los estudiantes desarrollarán habilidades para resolver problemas complejos en ingeniería eléctrica y física."

name: Deep Learning and its Vision Applications
description: This intermediate-level course, EE806, explores the theoretical foundations and practical implementations of deep learning techniques in computer vision applications. Students will learn to design, develop, and apply convolutional neural networks, recurrent neural networks, and other architectures to tackle complex image and video processing tasks, and gain hands-on experience with popular open-source deep learning frameworks.

name: Digital Signal Processing
description:
EE845: Digital Signal Processing

Esta asignatura proporciona una introducción profunda a las teorías y técnicas de procesamiento de señales digitales, incluyendo la transformada de Fourier discreta, la transformada discreta de Fourier rápida, y algoritmos de filtrado y detección de patrones en señales digitales. Los estudiantes aprenderán a aplicar estas técnicas para analizar y procesar señales digitales en diversas aplicaciones, como análisis de señales biomedicas, procesamiento de audio y comunicaciones digitales. A través de prácticas y proyectos, los estudiantes desarrollarán habilidades prácticas para implementar y evaluar algoritmos de procesamiento

name: Image Processing
description: This course covers the fundamental principles and techniques of image processing, including image filtering, transforms, and compression. Students will learn to analyze and apply image processing algorithms using MATLAB, and develop skills in image acquisition, enhancement, restoration, and reconstruction. Throughout the course, students will apply theoretical concepts to real-world problems in image processing.

name: Antenna Design and Characteristic Measurement
description: Este curso de EE850, Antenas: Diseño y Medición de Características, ofrece una comprensión profunda de los conceptos fundamentales y técnicas avanzadas en el diseño y análisis de antenas, incluyendo la modelización de antenas, métodos de simulación y técnicas de medición experimental para determinar sus características eléctricas y magnéticas. Los estudiantes aprenderán a diseñar y optimizar antenas para aplicaciones específicas y a interpretar resultados de medición, desarrollando habilidades prácticas para la resolución de problemas en este campo.

name: Science & Technology Innovation and Foresight Thinking
description: This course explores the principles and methods of science and technology innovation and foresight thinking, enabling students to identify and analyze emerging trends, anticipate future challenges, and develop strategic solutions to drive technological advancements and societal progress. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical case studies, students will acquire skills in future-oriented thinking, creativity, and problem-solving to navigate the complexities of technological innovation.

name: Analysis and Best Practice to High-Tech Industry
description: In diesem Kurs (EE853) werden Studenten mit den besten Praktiken und Analysetechniken für die Erforschung der Hochtechnologieindustrie vertraut gemacht. Dabei wird ein fachübergreifender Ansatz angewendet, um die Herausforderungen und Potenziale der Industrie zu verstehen und innovative Lösungen zu entwickeln. Durch die Analyse von Fallstudien und praktischen Projekten werden die Studierenden in die Lage versetzt, fundierte Entscheidungen zu treffen und Strategien zu entwickeln, um die Hochtechnologieindustrie erfolgreich zu gestalten.

name: Fourier Optics
description: In this advanced course, EE880 Fourier Optics (in Spanish), students will delve into the principles and applications of Fourier optics, covering topics such as the Fourier transform, optical filtering, and image processing. Through theoretical and experimental approaches, students will gain a deep understanding of how to analyze and manipulate optical signals, developing expertise in the design and application of optical systems.

name: Image Inspection and Detection Technique
description: "EE881 Image Inspection and Detection Technique: This course introduces students to advanced image inspection and detection techniques, covering fundamental concepts, theoretical foundations, and practical applications in computer vision. Students will learn to design and develop efficient algorithms for object detection, image segmentation, and feature extraction, developing a comprehensive understanding of image inspection methodologies."

name: Digital Logic Design 智慧型控制學程 數位科技應用學程 積體電路設計學程
description: This course, EEA112 智慧型控制學程 數位科技應用學程 積體電路設計學程, focuses on the fundamental principles and techniques of digital logic design, covering topics such as digital circuit analysis, number system and computer arithmetic, and digital system design. Students will learn to design, analyze, and optimize digital systems using various digital logic design methodologies and tools. Upon completion, students will be able to apply their knowledge to real-world digital system applications.

name: General PhysicsII Teaching in English
description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamental principles of physics, covering topics such as electromagnetic waves, relativity, and quantum mechanics. Students will develop a deep understanding of the underlying theories and mathematical models, as well as practical laboratory techniques for experimental verification. Through lectures, discussions, and hands-on experiments, students will acquire critical thinking and problem-solving skills in the context of physics.

name: General Physics Lab.II
description: This course provides hands-on experience in the fundamental principles and concepts of physics, focusing on experimentation, data analysis, and critical thinking. Students will conduct experiments and investigations to explore topics in mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism, developing a deeper understanding of the underlying physical laws and phenomena.

name: CalculusII
description: Esta segunda parte de cálculo desarrolla los conceptos de funciones de variables múltiples, límites, derivadas parciales y totales, integrales dobles y triples, así como aplicaciones y métodos de cálculo en diferentes áreas de la matemática y física. Durante el curso, los estudiantes aprenderán a manipular y resolver ecuaciones y problemas que involucran cálculo multivariable, y aplicarán estas habilidades en la resolución de problemas en matemáticas, física y otras disciplinas.

name: Digital Logic Design Laboratory
description: In this hands-on laboratory course, students design and implement digital logic circuits and systems, gaining practical experience with modern design tools and technologies. Through a series of projects and experiments, students will learn to analyze, design, and optimize digital systems, applying theoretical concepts to real-world applications.

name: Programming Language Lab.II 智慧電網學程 數位科技應用學程
description: This course, Programming Language Lab.II, is a hands-on introduction to programming concepts and techniques for intelligent power systems. Students will learn to design, implement, and evaluate algorithms for smart grid applications, fostering their ability to apply digital technologies to real-world problems. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical exercises, students will develop programming skills and critical thinking in preparing for careers in intelligent power systems.

name: Engineering MathematicsII
description: EEA204: Ingenieur Mathematik II - Diese Vorlesung baut auf dem Grundlagenwissen aus EEA103 auf und behandelt mehrere mathematische Konzepte, die für das Ingenieurwesen von entscheidender Bedeutung sind. Im Laufe des Kurses werden studenten die Anwendung von linearen Algebra, Differentialgleichungen und Funktionentheorie in ingenieurtechnischen Anwendungen lernen.

name: ElectronicsII 智慧型控制學程 積體電路設計學程
description: This course, Electronics II 智慧型控制學程 積體電路設計學程 (EEA206), builds upon foundational electronics knowledge by introducing advanced topics in integrated circuit design, smart control systems, and their applications. Students will learn to design, analyze, and implement digital and analog circuits, as well as develop expertise in microcontrollers and system integration. Through hands-on experiments and projects, students will develop a comprehensive understanding of modern electronics and its role in intelligent control systems.

name: ElectromagneticsI 全校性跨領域--綠色能源學程 智慧電網學程
description: EEA227 Electromagnetics I 全校性跨領域--綠色能源學程 智慧電網學程: This course introduces fundamental concepts and theories in electromagnetics, covering topics such as Maxwell's equations, wave propagation, and electromagnetic field analysis. Students will learn to apply mathematical techniques to solve problems related to electromagnetic phenomena, with a focus on practical applications in green energy and smart grid systems. Through lectures and assignments, students will develop a comprehensive understanding of electromagnetics principles and their role in modern energy technologies.

name: Electronic Circuits ExperimentsII
description: Esta práctica experimental complementa los conceptos teóricos presentados en EEA231, permitiendo a los estudiantes desarrollar habilidades prácticas en el diseño y análisis de circuitos electrónicos utilizando herramientas de medición y simulación. Se abordarán temas como análisis de circuitos, selección de componentes y simulación de circuitos electrónicos. Al finalizar el curso, los estudiantes podrán diseñar y implementar circuitos electrónicos para aplicaciones específicas.

name: Advance in Electric Circuits 智慧電網學程
description: This course, EEA243 智慧電網學程, provides a comprehensive exploration of advanced electric circuits, focusing on the theoretical and practical aspects of modern power systems. Students will gain in-depth knowledge of circuit analysis, power system operation, and control, as well as the application of intelligent technologies in the design and management of smart grids. By the end of the course, students will be able to analyze and optimize complex electric circuit systems.

name: Signals and Systems 智慧生醫學程
description: EEA305 智慧生醫學程 (Signals and Systems): 本課程探討生醫系統的信號與系統理論，涵蓋信號處理、系統分析、以及生醫應用；學生將學習分析生醫系統的方法，了解系統的動態行為並應用在智慧生醫領域。

name: Electrical Topics
description: In this course, EEA478 "Electrical Topics" (offered in Spanish), students will delve into the fundamental principles and applications of electrical engineering, including circuit analysis, electrical machines, and power systems. Through lectures, discussions, and hands-on exercises, students will develop a comprehensive understanding of electrical systems and their role in modern technological advancements. By the end of the course, students will be able to analyze, design, and solve complex electrical problems.

name: Optimal Control
description: "Esta asignatura de Optimal Control introduce a los estudiantes a los fundamentos y aplicaciones de la teoría del control óptimo, enfocándose en el desarrollo de modelos y algoritmos para optimizar sistemas complejos. A través de casos de estudio y análisis de problemas, los estudiantes aprenderán a diseñar y evaluar estrategias de control que minimicen costos y maximicen rendimientos en diversas disciplinas. Al finalizar la asignatura, los estudiantes serán capaces de aplicar métodos de control óptimo a problemas reales, demostrando un sólido conocimiento de las herramientas teóricas y prácticas necesarias."

name: Stochastic Control
description: In this graduate-level course, EEA529 Stochastic Control, students will acquire a deep understanding of stochastic control theory and its applications, including optimal control of stochastic systems, dynamic programming, and stochastic differential equations. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical case studies, students will learn to analyze and solve complex control problems in dynamic systems with uncertain parameters and outcomes.

name: VLSI Signal Processing Teaching in English 積體電路設計學程
description: This course explores the fundamental concepts and techniques of Very-Large-Scale Integration (VLSI) signal processing, enabling students to design and implement efficient digital signal processing systems. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and hands-on design experiences, students will gain expertise in VLSI architecture, algorithmic design, and hardware-software co-design.

name: Communication Electronics Teaching in English 人工智慧「智慧終端晶片設計」微學程 人工智慧學程 積體電路設計學程
description: In this micro-course, students will learn the fundamental principles and design methodologies of intelligent terminal chip design, a crucial aspect of artificial intelligence and embedded systems. Through a combination of lectures and hands-on exercises, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of communication electronics teaching, including circuit design, system integration, and testing, with a focus on English-language communication. By the end of the course, students will be able to design and implement intelligent terminal chip systems that meet the demands of modern artificial intelligence applications.

name: Digital VLSI Design 人工智慧「智慧終端晶片設計」微學程 人工智慧學程 積體電路設計學程
description: This course, titled "Digital VLSI Design 人工智慧「智慧終端晶片設計」微學程 人工智慧學程 積體電路設計學程", is a specialized course that covers the fundamental principles and methodologies of digital Very Large Scale Integration (VLSI) design. Students will learn how to design, synthesize, and verify digital integrated circuits using advanced CAD tools and techniques, with a focus on application in artificial intelligence and smart terminal chip design.

name: Neural Network Teaching in English 人工智慧「智慧控制與無人載具」微學程 人工智慧「智慧視覺分析」微學程 人工智慧學程 智慧型控制學程
description: This course, Neural Network Teaching in English, provides students with a comprehensive understanding of neural network applications in intelligent control systems and autonomous vehicles. Students will learn to design, implement, and evaluate neural network-based solutions for intelligent control, computer vision, and autonomous systems. Through hands-on projects and case studies, students will develop expertise in applying neural networks to real-world problems in intelligent control and autonomous systems.

name: Seminar
description: In this seminar course (EEA607), students will engage in in-depth discussions and critical analysis of contemporary issues in a specific field of study, developing their research and presentation skills through the examination of complex topics and debates. By actively participating in seminars and refining their thinking, students will cultivate a deeper understanding of theoretical frameworks and their application in real-world contexts.

name: The Advanced VLSI System Design Teaching in English
description: In this advanced course, EEA608 The Advanced VLSI System Design Teaching in English, students will delve into the intricate aspects of Very Large Scale Integration (VLSI) system design, covering topics such as architecture, digital circuit design, and verification techniques. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and hands-on experiences, students will gain expertise in designing and implementing complex VLSI systems, preparing them for careers in the semiconductor and electronics industries.

name: Computer Vision Teaching in English 人工智慧「智慧視覺分析」微學程 人工智慧「電腦輔助診斷應用」微學程 人工智慧學程 智慧生醫學程
description: In this advanced course, EEA625 Computer Vision Teaching in English, students will learn to apply cutting-edge computer vision techniques for intelligent visual analysis, diagnosis, and decision-making in biomedical and healthcare applications. Through lectures, discussions, and hands-on projects, students will develop expertise in designing and implementing computer vision algorithms for image and video understanding, object detection, and classification. By the end of the course, students will be able to integrate computer vision with machine learning and artificial intelligence to drive innovative solutions in healthcare and biomedicine.

name: Transmission Standards of Digital Home Network 物聯網學程 數位科技應用學程
description: This course, Transmission Standards of Digital Home Network, covers the fundamental principles and technologies of digital home network systems, including wireless and wired communication protocols, network architecture, and devices. Students will learn to analyze and design digital home network systems that meet transmission standards, ensuring efficient and reliable communication within smart home environments.

name: Algorithms of Image Processing: Development and Applications Teaching in English
description: This course, EEA656 Algorithms of Image Processing: Development and Applications, explores the foundational algorithms and techniques used in image processing, covering topics such as image filtering, segmentation, feature extraction, and object recognition. Students will gain hands-on experience in implementing these algorithms and learn to apply them in real-world applications, including computer vision, remote sensing, and medical imaging. Upon completion, students will be equipped with the skills to develop and analyze image processing algorithms for diverse industries.

name: Special topics on next generation network and network implementation
description: In this specialized course, EEA658, students will delve into the cutting-edge concepts and technologies of next-generation networks, exploring their design, implementation, and management. Through a mix of theoretical foundations and practical applications, students will gain in-depth knowledge of network architectures, protocols, and security measures, enabling them to address the complex challenges of modern network infrastructure.

name: Advanced Design and Implementation of Integrated Circuits Ⅱ
description: This course is an in-depth exploration of advanced techniques in integrated circuit design and implementation. Students will delve into the design and optimization of complex ICs, covering topics such as mixed-signal circuit design, advanced fabrication technologies, and system-on-chip (SoC) integration. Through hands-on projects and case studies, students will develop expertise in implementing high-performance, low-power, and cost-effective IC solutions.

name: Advanced Design and Implementation of Integrated Circuits Ⅳ
description: This course provides in-depth knowledge and practical skills for the advanced design and implementation of integrated circuits, focusing on the latest technologies and methodologies in the field. Students will learn how to design, simulate, and optimize complex integrated circuits, including analog and mixed-signal circuits, and apply their knowledge to real-world applications.

name: Data Science Teaching in English
description: In this course, EEA677: Data Science Teaching in English, students will develop the skills and knowledge necessary to effectively teach data science principles and methods to students who are non-native English speakers. Through a combination of theoretical foundations, practical exercises, and case studies, learners will gain expertise in designing and delivering data science curricula in English, as well as evaluating student learning outcomes. By course completion, students will be well-equipped to teach data science courses in English to diverse student populations.

name: Deep Learning Teaching in English 人工智慧學程 數位科技應用學程
description: This course, EEA680: Deep Learning Teaching in English, provides students with a comprehensive understanding of deep learning concepts and their applications in educational settings. Through hands-on experiences and case studies, students will learn to design and implement effective deep learning-based teaching methods, leveraging digital technologies to enhance language instruction and promote student engagement.

name: Systems Engineering
description: In this comprehensive course, EEA685 Systems Engineering, students will delve into the principles, methodologies, and tools essential for designing and developing complex systems, integrating technical, societal, and environmental considerations to achieve optimal performance and sustainable outcomes. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical applications, students will learn to analyze complex systems, identify key performance indicators, and apply systems engineering techniques to solve real-world problems. By the end of the course, students will possess a solid understanding of the systems engineering discipline and be equipped to apply its principles in various fields.

name: Wireless Power Transfer Technology in 5G and IoT Era Teaching in English
description: This course, EEA689 Wireless Power Transfer Technology in 5G and IoT Era, provides in-depth knowledge on the principles, design, and applications of wireless power transfer (WPT) systems, focusing on their integration with 5G networks and the Internet of Things (IoT). Students will learn about WPT technologies, system design considerations, and implementation challenges, as well as their impact on the development of 5G and IoT applications. Through lectures, discussions, and hands-on experiments, students will develop a comprehensive understanding of WPT and its potential applications in various fields.

name: Reinforcement Learning Teaching in English 人工智慧學程
description: This course, EEA699 Reinforcement Learning Teaching in English 人工智慧學程, explores the fundamental concepts and techniques of reinforcement learning, a subfield of artificial intelligence. Students will learn to design and implement reinforcement learning models, analyze their performance, and apply them to real-world problems, with a focus on teaching and learning in an English-language environment.

name: Power Systems and Green Energy Teaching in English
description: In this course, EEA704 Power Systems and Green Energy, students will explore the fundamental principles and technologies driving the transition towards sustainable power systems, including renewable energy sources, energy storage, and smart grid management. Through lectures, discussions, and case studies, students will develop a comprehensive understanding of the technical, economic, and environmental aspects of green energy, enabling them to design and implement effective solutions for a low-carbon future.

name: Projects Production
description:
EEA802 Projects Production: 
Este curso aborda a planificação, gestão e implementação de projetos de produção, incluindo a análise de necessidades de mercado, definição de objetivos e cronogramas, e a gestão de recursos e riscos. Os alunos aprenderão a desenvolver habilidades práticas para gerir projetos de produção de forma eficaz e a aplicar conceitos teóricos em contextos reais.

name: CalculusI
description: Cette cours (EEB101) : Calcul différentiel et intégral, couvre les principes fondamentaux de l'analyse mathématique, notamment les limites, les fonctions, les dérivées, les applications des dérivées, les intégrales et les applications des intégrales. Les étudiants acquerront une compréhension approfondie des concepts et des techniques essentiels de la calcul différentiel et calcul intégral.

name: CalculusII
description: EEB102: Calculus II - A course in which students will develop their mathematical understanding through the study of differential equations, series, and parametric functions, including techniques for solving and analyzing these mathematical models. Through a combination of lectures, problem-solving sessions, and assignments, students will gain a deeper comprehension of the theoretical and applied aspects of calculus and its applications in mathematics, science, and engineering. Upon completion, students will be able to apply advanced calculus techniques to solve real-world problems.

name: Introduction to Computer Science 物聯網學程
description: This course (EEB108) provides an introduction to fundamental concepts and principles of computer science with a focus on 物聯網 (Internet of Things) applications. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical exercises, students will learn to design, develop, and implement computer systems and networks, with an emphasis on real-world 物聯網 scenarios.

description: 本課程探討線性方程組、矩陣運算、線性變換、特徵值與特徵向量等基礎線性代數概念。學生將學習線性代數在數位科技領域的應用，包括資料分析、數值計算及最佳化等。

name: Digital Logic Design 智慧型控制學程 數位科技應用學程 積體電路設計學程
description: In this comprehensive course, EEB111 智慧型控制學程 數位科技應用學程 積體電路設計學程, students will delve into the fundamental principles and applications of digital logic design, exploring the design, analysis, and implementation of digital systems, including combinational and sequential logic circuits. Through hands-on projects and theoretical foundations, students will gain a deep understanding of digital circuit design, enabling them to tackle complex problems in the fields of computer engineering, automation, and control systems.

name: Data Structures 物聯網學程 智慧生醫學程 數位科技應用學程
description: EEB113 Data Structures 物聯網學程 智慧生醫學程 數位科技應用學程: This course introduces students to fundamental data structures and algorithms in the context of IoT, intelligent healthcare, and digital technology applications. Through lectures and hands-on exercises, students will learn to design, implement, and analyze efficient data structures and algorithms to solve problems in these interdisciplinary fields.

name: General Physics
description:
EEB116: Allgemeine Physik. 
In diesem Kurs werden die grundlegenden Prinzipien der Mechanik, Wärme, Elektromagnetismus und Wellenlehre behandelt, einschließlich mathematischer Modellierung und Simulierung. Durch die Analyse von Experimenten und theoretischen Konzepten werden Studenten ein solides Verständnis der physischen Welt entwickeln.

name: Logic Circuit Lab. Teaching in English
description: In this hands-on laboratory course, students will design, implement, and analyze digital logic circuits using state-of-the-art tools and technologies, applying theoretical concepts to real-world problems and developing essential skills in circuit simulation, debugging, and optimization. Through a series of experiments and projects, students will gain a deep understanding of digital logic principles, circuit architectures, and design methodologies, preparing them for careers in electronics engineering and related fields.

name: General Physics Lab.
description: In this hands-on laboratory course, students explore fundamental principles of physics through experiments and data analysis, developing a deeper understanding of mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism. Students will learn to design and conduct experiments, collect and interpret data, and think critically about physical phenomena. Through practical application and scientific inquiry, students will acquire essential skills for further study in physics and related fields.

name: Programming Language Labs I 人工智慧學程
description: EEB126 Programming Language Labs I 人工智慧學程: This course introduces students to the fundamental concepts of programming languages through hands-on experience with various programming tools and languages, emphasizing problem-solving skills and logical thinking. Students will learn to design, implement, and debug computer programs, developing a solid foundation in programming principles and practices essential for artificial intelligence applications.

name: Programming Language Labs II
description: In this hands-on, project-based course, students will apply theoretical programming concepts to real-world problems through a series of experiments and programming exercises, deepening their understanding of programming paradigms and language design. Course topics will include object-oriented programming, functional programming, and data structures in a variety of programming languages, with a focus on practical implementation and problem-solving skills. Through lab work and peer review, students will develop their programming expertise and critical thinking abilities.

name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence and Information Technology Teaching in English
description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamental concepts and applications of Artificial Intelligence and Information Technology, focusing on teaching methodologies and strategies in an English-language classroom setting. Students will acquire the skills and knowledge to design, develop, and implement AI-driven educational tools and technologies, as well as cultivate effective pedagogical practices for teaching English-medium IT courses.

name: ElectronicsII 智慧型控制學程 積體電路設計學程
description: "EBE202 智慧型控制學程 積體電路設計學程: 本課程深入探討智能控制系統與積體電路設計的理論基礎與實踐應用, 並培養學生具備微電子設計、積體電路製造技術與系統整合能力。學生將學習設計與實現智慧型控制系統的各個層面, 包括感測器設計、微控制器系統以及系統軟體編程。"

name: Engineering MathematicsII
description: This course, Engineering Mathematics II, introduces students to advanced mathematical concepts and techniques fundamental to engineering disciplines. Topics covered include differential equations, linear algebra, and multivariable calculus, with applications to real-world engineering problems. Through this course, students will develop their problem-solving skills and mathematical reasoning to effectively tackle complex engineering challenges.

name: Electronic Circuits ExperimentsII
description: Este curso, EEB206 Circuitos Electrónicos Experimentales II, es una continuación de la teoría y práctica de circuitos electrónicos, donde los estudiantes aprenderán a diseñar y experimentar con diferentes tipos de circuitos analógicos y digitales, y a aplicar técnicas de análisis y simulación para comprender su comportamiento. A través de experimentos prácticos y proyectos, los estudiantes desarrollarán habilidades para la implementación y evaluación de circuitos electrónicos, y aprenderán a resolver problemas en electrónica de manera efectiva.

name: Micro-Computer Systems 物聯網學程 智慧型控制學程 數位科技應用學程
description: This course, Micro-Computer Systems 物聯網學程 智慧型控制學程 數位科技應用學程, covers the fundamental principles and design concepts of micro-computer systems, including hardware, software, and networking aspects. Through lectures and hands-on experiments, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of micro-computer systems and their applications in intelligent control and IoT technologies. By the end of the course, students will be able to design and implement efficient and effective micro-computer systems for various digital technology applications.

description: EEB210 ElectromagneticsI 全校性跨領域--綠色能源學程 智慧電網學程: This course introduces fundamental concepts of electromagnetics, covering the theory and applications of electric and magnetic fields, Maxwell's equations, and electromagnetic waves. Students will learn to analyze and solve problems in electromagnetics, laying a solid foundation for further studies in electrical engineering and related fields.

name: Signals and Systems 智慧生醫學程
description: "EEB211 智慧生醫學程: This course covers the fundamental theory and applications of signals and systems in the field of biomedical engineering, focusing on signal processing, filtering, and analysis techniques. Students will learn to design, analyze, and optimize systems for biomedical applications, developing problem-solving skills and critical thinking in the context of medical engineering and technology. Through lectures, discussions, and project-based learning, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of signals and systems principles and their practical applications in healthcare."

name: Introduction to Computer Vision and Image Processing
description: In this interdisciplinary course, EEB215, students delve into the fundamental principles of computer vision and image processing, exploring techniques for image analysis, segmentation, and feature extraction, as well as object detection and recognition. Through hands-on exercises and projects, students learn to apply these concepts to real-world applications and develop strong programming skills in a specialized software environment. By the end of the course, students will be equipped to address complex challenges in image analysis and processing.

name: Game Programming

description: This course provides an in-depth exploration of computer science teaching methodologies and pedagogical approaches for effective instruction in English. Students will learn to design, implement, and evaluate computer science curricula, develop English communication skills, and cultivate a supportive learning environment for diverse students. Upon completion, students will be equipped to teach computer science concepts to students who are non-native speakers of English.

name: Programming Language LabsI Teaching in English
description: In this hands-on course, EI109 Programming Language Labs I introduces students to the fundamental concepts of programming through a series of lab-based exercises and projects, focusing on problem-solving, algorithm design, and programming best practices. Students will learn to design, implement, and test programs in a chosen programming language, developing a solid understanding of programming principles and skills essential for software development.

name: Science and Technology English Conversation Teaching in English
description: This course, EI111 Science and Technology English Conversation Teaching in English, equips students with the skills to effectively teach science and technology concepts in English to various audiences. Through interactive discussions, case studies, and hands-on teaching practices, students will learn to create engaging lesson plans, manage classroom dynamics, and assess student learning outcomes in a science and technology English conversation teaching context.

name: Linear Algebra Teaching in English
description: In this course, EI115 Linear Algebra Teaching in English, students will develop a deep understanding of linear algebra concepts and learn effective pedagogical strategies for teaching these complex mathematical topics to non-native English speakers. Through hands-on activities and case studies, students will enhance their content knowledge and communication skills to create an inclusive and supportive learning environment for students with diverse linguistic backgrounds.

name: ElectronicsI Teaching in English
description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamental principles and practices of electronics, covering topics such as circuit analysis, electronic devices, and digital electronics. Students will learn to design, analyze, and troubleshoot electronic circuits, and gain practical experience with laboratory equipment and tools. Upon completion, students will have a solid foundation in electronics and be well-prepared for further studies in this field.

name: Engineering MathematicsI Teaching in English
description: This course, EI203 Engineering Mathematics I, introduces students to fundamental mathematical concepts and techniques essential for engineering applications, including differential equations, vector calculus, and linear algebra. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical problem-solving, students will develop analytical and computational skills to tackle complex engineering problems. By the end of the course, students will be equipped with a solid understanding of mathematical tools and techniques to support their future engineering studies.

name: Circuit Theory Teaching in English
description: In this comprehensive course, EI205 Circuit Theory Teaching in English, students will delve into the fundamental concepts of circuit analysis, including circuit laws, network theorems, and AC circuit theory. Through lectures and problem-solving exercises, students will develop a deep understanding of circuit theory and enhance their ability to communicate complex ideas in English. By the end of the course, students will be able to analyze and solve circuit problems with precision and clarity.

name: Electronic Circuits ExperimentsI Teaching in English
description: This course, EI207 Electronic Circuits Experiments I, provides hands-on experience in designing, building, and testing electronic circuits, with a focus on fundamental circuit analysis and design principles. Students will learn to apply theoretical concepts to practical problem-solving, develop critical thinking skills in circuit analysis, and design and implement simple electronic circuits using various components and tools.

name: Science and Technology English Writing Teaching in English 專業科技傳播學程
description: This course, EI209 Science and Technology English Writing Teaching in English, equips students with the expertise to teach English writing skills to science and technology students, focusing on effective communication strategies and pedagogical techniques. By the end of the course, students will be able to create pedagogically sound English writing curricula and instructional materials for science and technology students.

name: Probability for Engineers
description: La probabilidad para ingenieros (EI211) es un curso que introduce a los estudiantes en el concepto fundamental de la probabilidad y sus aplicaciones en ingeniería. Al finalizar el curso, los estudiantes podrán evaluar y reducir riesgos, tomar decisiones informadas y diseñar sistemas confiables.

name: Data Structures
description: Esta cátedra de Estructuras de Datos (EI219) introduce a los estudiantes los conceptos fundamentales y las técnicas de implementación de estructuras de datos, incluyendo listas enlazadas, pilas, colas, árboles binarios y grafos. A través de proyectos y ejercicios prácticos, los estudiantes desarrollarán habilidades para analizar y resolver problemas complejos utilizando estructuras de datos eficientes. Al finalizar esta cátedra, los estudiantes estará equipado para diseñar y implementar algoritmos y estructuras de datos efectivos en aplicaciones de software.

name: Innovations in Medical High-Tech Applications Teaching in English
description: This course explores the latest innovations in medical high-tech applications, focusing on design, development, and implementation of cutting-edge technologies in healthcare. Students will gain comprehensive knowledge of medical device engineering, artificial intelligence in medicine, and regulatory compliance, enabling them to critically evaluate and create innovative medical solutions.

name: Japanese Conversation
description: In this intermediate-level language course, students of Japanese will engage in interactive conversations to refine their listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills, with a focus on nuanced expression and idiomatic language use. Through a combination of lectures, discussions, and role-playing exercises, students will develop their ability to communicate effectively in Japanese, both in formal and informal settings. name: JapaneseII
description: This course, Japanese II, builds upon foundational knowledge in Japanese language and culture, focusing on advanced grammar, vocabulary, and nuanced communication skills. name: JapaneseIV
description: In this advanced-level course, students will refine their proficiency in Japanese by exploring complex grammar structures, nuanced vocabulary, and sophisticated written and oral communication skills. name: Mandarin ChineseI
description: In this foundational course, students of Mandarin Chinese I will develop basic proficiency in the listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills necessary for everyday communication in Chinese. name: Mandarin ChineseII
description: In Mandarin Chinese II, students will further develop their language skills through an immersive and communicative approach, honing their comprehension, speaking, reading, and writing abilities. name: Learning English Through Films Teaching in English
description: This course, EL220 Learning English Through Films Teaching in English, provides students with a comprehensive understanding of how to utilize film as a pedagogical tool in English language instruction. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical applications, students will develop the skills necessary to design and implement effective English language teaching practices that incorporate film, including content analysis, lesson planning, and classroom implementation. name: English Through Literature & Reading
description: In this intermediate-level course (EL221), students will delve into the exploration of English language and literature through a diverse range of reading materials, including fiction, non-fiction, and poetry. Through engaging discussions and written assignments, students will cultivate their critical thinking and effective communication skills in English.

name: English for Engineering & Technology
description: In this intermediate-level course, EL222 English for Engineering & Technology, students will develop essential language skills and technical vocabulary to effectively communicate complex engineering concepts, ideas, and proposals in Sinhala. name: Media & News English Teaching in English
description: In this course, EL223 Media & News English Teaching in English, students will develop an understanding of media and news discourse in English, exploring the linguistic features and cultural contexts that underpin effective communication. Through a combination of theoretical foundations and practical applications, students will learn to design and deliver engaging English language lessons that incorporate media and news materials. name: English Around the World 寰宇文化微學程

name: Business English

Through lectures, discussions, and written assignments, students will explore key concepts in business communication, including terminology, syntax, and presentation skills, while refining their language abilities in a culturally relevant context. name: Business English: Ethical issues in a Global Economy Teaching in English

description: In this specialized course, EL232 IELTS Test Preparation Teaching in English, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of the IELTS exam format, question types, and assessment criteria, enabling them to effectively prepare students for the test. name: English Public Speaking Teaching in English 寰宇文化微學程

name: Introductory English-Chinese Translation 寰宇文化微學程

name: English for Tourism Teaching in English 寰宇文化微學程

name: English Testing

name: GermanII

description: In this advanced level course, students of Mandarin Chinese will refine their language skills through immersive practice in reading, writing, listening, and speaking. name: Chinese Proficiency Test

name: Advanced Mandarin Conversation
description: In this advanced level course, students will refine their Mandarin conversational skills through extensive interaction, cultural immersion, and nuanced language exploration. name: Advanced Mandarin Readings
description: In this advanced-level course, students will delve into complex literary and contemporary texts in Mandarin, developing their reading comprehension, vocabulary, and critical analysis skills through in-depth discussions and written analyses. name: Chinese Proficiency Test
description: In this intensive course, EL375 Chinese Proficiency Test equips students with the necessary skills to succeed in the HSK (Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi) and HSKK (Hanyu Shuiping Kaoshi Kouyu Shuiping) exams, benchmarking their proficiency in Chinese language and speaking.
